pages.text: $(o)Peeling off the flesh of a demon...$()$(br2)This $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() targets the taglocked demon and forces its body to rot and decay.$(br)There are two variants available, one for simply rotting the flesh and one for making it decay completely.
Rot the flesh of a living demon.
Decay the skin of a living demon.
